page.title: 18HOME-LIFE
page.content: My name is{Inderjit Bajway}and I live at{3 Trelawney Rd Chacewater Truro. My mum comes and wakes me up at {7.40.}While my mum is making my breakfast,I change into my school uniform.Afterwards,I go downstairs and eat my breakfast of toast and a cup of coffee or tea.After breakfast I wash my face,brush my teeth,and comb my hair.I pack my lunch and prepare to go to{school. I leave home at{8.45.}On the way to school I meet my friends and walk up with them. When I reach school the{9.00}bell rings and we all go into school. We come out of school again at{3.30. After school I watch T.V. or I go outside and play with my friends.I come in to have my tea at{5.45.}After I watch T.V. and read until bedtime.
